body.raw:
{"charset":"UTF-8","baseEncoding":"BASE16_LOWERCASE","method":"HMAC_SIGNATURE_CALCULATION","name":"Bambora Webhook_export","source":"<#assign dataPart = input.body?substring(0, input.body?last_index_of("&hashValue="))>
<#if dataPart?contains("cavvResult=+")>
    <#assign dataPart = dataPart?replace("cavvResult=+", "cavvResult= ")>
</#if>
<#assign result = "" >
<#assign strs = dataPart?split("") >
<#list strs as str>
    <#assign index = str_index>
    <#if str == ".">
        <#if (index > 0) && (index < strs?size - 1)>
            <#if strs[index - 1]?matches("[0-9]") && strs[index + 1]?matches("[0-9]")>
                <#assign result = result + ".">
            <#else>
                <#assign result = result + "%2E">
            </#if>
        <#else>
            <#assign result = result + "%2E">
        </#if>
    <#else>
        <#assign result = result + str>
    </#if>
</#list>
${result}${vars.webHookKey}","id":703,"isHmacSignature":false,"algorithm":"SHA1","target":"<#assign hashValue = input.body?substring(input.body?last_index_of("hashValue=") + 10)>
${hashValue}"}
